mapper.select: SELECT ma.agent_id AS agentId, ma.mem_id AS memId, mb.real_name AS realName, ma.team_num AS teamNum, ma.parent_id AS parentId, mb.total_deposit AS totalDeposit, mb.total_enchashment AS totalenchashment, mb.create_time AS createtime FROM mem_agent ma INNER JOIN mem_baseinfo mb ON ma.mem_id = mb.mem_id
